body.p:
E.Town
June 2th. 1861.
George W. Johnson Esq
Dr Sir

I can see no way to pay you the amt. T. & C,, are owing you. rest ashured every exercise on my part will be used, Could I sell property would gladly So to pay the amt due. you, but like every body else can find none with money to pay for any thing or can I collect. what is due me or any part of it.
